thread.title: Your first look at tonight’s Golden Globes show
thread.title_full: Your first look at tonight’s Golden Globes show | New York Post

author: David K. Li
title: Your first look at tonight’s Golden Globes show
text:
Funnyman Jimmy Fallon and a flock of dancers will greet Golden Globes viewers on Sunday night.
In an obvious homage to La La Land, show host Fallon dashes down a red carpet with black cars on either side of him during the opening bit.
Male and female dancers, including a man in full military garb,twirl on top of the vehicles as the tuxedo-wearing Fallon saunters down the path, according to the 10-second teaser that surfaced on the “Tonight Show’s” YouTube channel.
